content.raw:
For specifying `//axis/xyz[@expressed_in]`, I’m now more concerned about the ambiguity between `@relative_to`s different states: does empty mean default? If so, how does one refer to the model? We force users to explicitly add the frame?

We’ve mentioned not providing the user to specify `__model__` implicitly… but maybe we do that? Otherwise, for transitioning, not only does the value have to change, but some arbitrary frame has to be added to accommodate referring to it…
content.html:
For specifying //axis/xyz[@expressed_in], I’m now more concerned about the ambiguity between @relative_tos different states: does empty mean default? If so, how does one refer to the model? We force users to explicitly add the frame?

We’ve mentioned not providing the user to specify __model__ implicitly… but maybe we do that? Otherwise, for transitioning, not only does the value have to change, but some arbitrary frame has to be added to accommodate referring to it…
